description:
This additional content includes:

- "Stuffed Diablos" Hunter layered weapon

Together forever, from your room to the hunting ground!
A stuffed Diablos that functions as a Hammer!

Equip yourself with special layered weapons and enjoy hunting!

After purchase, speak to the Courier in the game and select Add-on Content to receive the content. Usage varies depending on the type of content, as listed below.

- Layered Weapons can be used in the Layered Equipment Settings menu of the Item Box. 
- Please note that this layered weapon is for Hammer.
- Layered Weapon is a "skin" which changes the appearance of the weapon without affecting its stats and abilities.
name: "Stuffed Diablos" Hunter layered weapon (Hammer)
